name: Combee

evolution.description: A female Combee can evolve into Vespiquen at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 17 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Bee Pokémon. A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to Vespiquen.

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.description: At the end of each battle, this Pokémon may roll a d20 + its proficiency bonus. On a result of 20 or higher, its trainer adds a Honey to their inventory.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.
